resources.string: Please stop other recording applications before using video camera.
The default storage is full,please release some space or manage the storage options in settings
Can\'t connect to the camera. Please make sure to close other apps that may use camera or flashlight.
Camera has been disabled because of security policies.
Device temperature is too high,please use the camera later.
Device temperature is too high and camera will exit automatically in 30 seconds. Please try to use it later.
"Camera do not support multi window mode"
"turn the phone to make front camera at the top to shoot the more beautiful you"
The recording application is running in the background and cannot be vedio recording. Please turn off the recording and try again.
The function of touch screen is not allowed in this interface,press the power button to exit
"To ensure the shooting effect, please make sure the lens is not blocked"
Capture is completed and optimize the picture
The dual-camera mode can capture the background blur effect, and it is recommended that the camera and the subject be no more than 2 meters away.
Please take the macro photos within 4cm distance.
Only works when taking pictures with the front-facing camera
After multi-frame synthesis, denoising, low-light HDR and other processing, the night scene photos become purer and brighter.
The camera will automatically adjust the exposure and color to make the recorded video more vivid.
The camera will automatically adjust the exposure and color to take the best picture.
"Smooth Skin", "Whiten", "Slim Face" and other beauty effects can be applied to the portrait when shooting.
Support manual adjustment of sensitivity, shutter speed, focus mode, and white balance to satisfy diversified and personalized shooting needs.
Higher resolution, sharper image (HDR and Night Scene are not available in this mode).
Take real and natural black-and-white photos.
Blur the background when taking portraits.
Identify portrait in real-time when taking photos, and black-and-white background highlights the color of the portrait.
Support manual adjustment of ISO sensitivity, shutter, exposure compensation, focus mode, and white balance to satisfy diversified and personalized shooting needs.
Effective when flashlight and HDR are both off
The camera can shoot a high-speed video at 120fps and then replay the video at 30 fps, realizing 4 times slower playback to slow down the wonderful moments.
